title: Enhancing Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies Through Instructional Design Grand Challenges

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (functions, geometry, statistics) and problem-solving strategies
context.additional_context: Conducting large-scale mathematical problem-solving projects in a smartphone-based LMS environment, providing continuous feedback through formative assessment

learning_goals: Students can analyze and define complex mathematical problems using the Grand Challenge Framework.
Learners can propose mathematical problem-solving strategies using a team-based problem-centered approach
Learners can collaborate with peers via LMS discussion boards and mobile tools to generate intermediate outputs

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
